topic.title: Deploy Yeastar Cloud PBX on Alibaba Cloud

ul.li:
SBC has two ethernet ports, eth0 created on Ali cloud, eth0:1 is a virtual ethernet to communicate with YMP LAN (eth0) ports.
Yeastar will add eth0:1 to the SBC instance when installing.
SBC WAN (eth0) can receive data from the Internet and send data to the Internet.
SBC instance acts as a gateway. The YMP will initiate outbound connections to the Internet through the SBC gateway.
